Hi, I just read about the destination earth project:
<https://ethz.ch/en/news-and-events/eth-news/news/2021/02/a-highly-accurate-digital-twin-of-our-planet.html>
Has anyone more detailed information about it. I just can find Use cases but I would like to know more details, for example are they going to use Julia :smile:

text: Not really more infos on this specific project, but there is an ongoing Julia HPC effort at CSCS <https://user.cscs.ch/tools/interactive/julia/> lead by <@UMCPULMA7> (including HPC Julia tools such as <https://github.com/omlins/ParallelStencil.jl|Parallelstencil.jl> and <https://github.com/eth-cscs/ImplicitGlobalGrid.jl|ImplicitGlobalGrid.jl>) :wink: . So if there is interest from the  project “leaders” they should have the basic environment ready to give it a shot.
